rooms.description: Spacious entrance with storage and decorative elements.
Open-plan living area featuring Mediterranean style decor.
Seating area adjacent to the kitchen with ample natural light.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with integrated dining bar.
Private bedroom with a balcony and Vastu-compliant positioning.
Spacious master bedroom with private balcony for meditation space.
Small guest bathroom near the living area.

openings.description: Decorative wooden door aligned with Vastu principles.
Large windows for natural light in the living area.
Staircase leading to the rooftop terrace.

rooms.description: Balcony-equipped room with ample light and privacy.
Spacious bedroom featuring an individual balcony and storage area.
Balcony room with Mediterranean decor for relaxation.
Luxurious master bathroom integrated within the bedroom area.
Small utility and storage room adjacent to the kitchen area.

openings.description: Direct access from bedrooms to balcony for fresh air.
Interior staircase connecting both floors with Vastu compliance.

rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean-themed rooftop terrace with views and seating area.
